name: Insurrection: Campaigns for StarCraft
description:
Insurrection: Campaigns for StarCraft is a strategy game developed by Aztech New Media. It came out on 31-07-1998. It was published by Aztech New Media. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Insurrection: Campaigns for StarCraft is available on PC.
It was produced by Fulvio Ciano.
